content: the front end of the head 5 or 6 times to embroider the nose and bury the yarn ends inside row 1 kfb 2 sts the stuffing row 2 knit row 3 kfb kfb 4 sts row 4 to 9 knit row 10 k1 k2tog k1 3 sts row 11 to 13 knit cast off tail eyes sew two 4mm beads onto the top of the make 1 cast on 5 sts in brown on 2 75mm needles head over the decrease sts on row 32 using the cable cast on cast off to make a small strip of knitting ears weave the cast on tail up the side of the ear and sew the cast off edge onto the top of the head starting 2 row behind the eye bury the yarn tails inside the stuffing tail sew one end onto the top of the body legs sew the side edges together and sew the cast on edge onto the bottom of the body sew onto the brown portion of the body at each end of the striped middle collar cut a 15cm length of blue dk yarn and tie around the neck double knot to secure and bury the ends inside the stuffing small sausage dog copyright © 2020 amanda berry page 3 of 3
